title: The.Desperate.Mission.1971.Ricardo.Montalban.DVDRip.H264.AC3-CLP
description:
<a href="http://thepiratebay.se/user/Commlinked/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://thepiratebay.se/user/Commlinked/</a>

Notes: This is a TV movie that was ripped from a DVD source. I am not sure what the original quality was, but for a TV movie from the era, I think the quality is fairly decent. I haven't fully watched it yet myself, but the parts I skimmed through seemed decent on both audio and video. Should be enjoyable for any Ricardo Montalban fan, or anyone who appreciates westerns.

==== Movie Info ====

Notes: This movie produced in 1969, however, it was not broadcast until 1971. I elected to use the broadcast date of 1971 in the file name.

The Desperate Mission - 1969

IMDB - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0066987/

Description - A man who has lost everything joins others paid to convey a wealthy man's wife - and a mysterious treasure - to safety in San Francisco.
